entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
